author: Mark Warner
comment: After much trial and error with other recording apps, I discovered this one when I bought my Android Wear watch. It is easily the BEST recording app I've ever used. A lot more functional and very aesthetically pleasing. Also highly recommend the full version.
title: Best audio recorder available

author: Martin Ricketts
comment: I disagree with others who say this is the best recorder available. However it does depend on which feature you value most. Cloud storage is a great feature but it's not really necessary given drop Dropbox and Google Drive auto upload features. The must-have feature in my book is Skip silence. audio recorder doesn't seem to have it but Smart recorder does, and more features to manage quality.
title: Good not great

author: Nick Jeremy
comment: I wanted to use this with my android wear, as I need to record lectures. The app is great for this as long as the max record time is less than 30 mins. Any longer than this , then there is only a 50 per cent chance it will get saved.

author: Albert Kurniawan Kuswandi
comment: When it works, it works great but the key here is 'when'. Have had more recordings failed ( especially the ones over 1 hour ) when trying to sync. Managed to get one, but 4 other recordings failed when trying to sync it and they aren't stored on the watch so they are gone for good when they fail to sync

author: Oscar Garcia
comment: I bought the feature that allows you to record on my smart watch but it does not work at all. I have a motto 360 2nd generation and and HTC m10 which should be pretty new to use a simple feature. I get an illegal= message, then it closes.  Not happy at all.

author: Anurag Bhattacharya
comment: I recorded an important call with this app. Parts are normal, as expected, and parts are totally sped up and i cant understand anything. The over all call was 1.5 hours, and the saved version shoes only 46 mins. What the hell went wrong? Can i fix the audio somehow?

author: Shane Borczuch
comment: Using with ZenWatch 2 & having no issues. Haven't tried all functions yet but so far so good. Had problems with initial setup due to a launcher installed on the watch. A delete/trash button is needed by the edit, tag and share buttons.
title: ZenWatch 2 Compatible

author: Al Fleagle
comment: This app is all about audio yet there is no intelligible sound on the promotional video in Google Play.  Not a good start.  The app asks permissions for everything including making phone calls but doesn't offer any explanation why it needs to control your life.  I just hope I didn't install a trojan.  Uninstalled immediately.

author: Yesselis Vanessa Madriz
comment: I had an S3, now its a J7 (6.0 - Marshmallow) and didn't work after I upgraded the watch. It gets an IlegalStateException. I sent an email to developer and nothing. If you care, i just got a video with the error, but I can't upload it here

reply.author: BinomV
reply.content: Hello. Could you send me your video to binom.mobile@gmail.com again? Thank you.

title: I think it worked when new

author: MIKE P
comment: huawei watch recording issues, crispy sound, unuseful... working clean on moto 360 on phone perfect/ no complains. Edit: the huawei updated to 2.0 same sound issues and something new- moto360 application crush system, watxh rebooting hinself...

author: Christian Macias
comment: It bugs out and crashes. On the phone it works fine but since I use it to record a lecture with my watch, it cannot bug out or I'll loose 45min-1hr of the lecture. The watch also said it synced but did not.
title: Downloaded it to use on moto 360

author: Mikko Savinainen
comment: Getting randomly messages about recording failed even when the app is not open. Almost always after a few days after use, the app on launch promotes me to buy the pro, even though i have already bought it. Forgets my settings also while it's at it. I don't want to babysit something that should just work. Otherwise it would be perfect.

author: Alex Bass
comment: Really liked this app, but dev seems to have gone MIA. I really want to purchase the pro version, but for the price tag and because the dev hasn't updated the app in a while, and the app keeps crashing on Android 8.0. Also, playback stops when screen turns off and you lose place in the recording.. what?! That's a big oversight. Probably moving over to Parrot. Such a shame.

Garbage!!! Used to work. Now comes up with Java Error message on smartwatch. Sorry I wasted the money.  Error shows up on 2 phones KitKat and Marshmallow, and 2 Smartwatches with latest software. Worked once upon a time.

author: Jason Goddard
comment: Awesome. Worth paying for the upgrade to enable cloud storage. Customer service is awesome. Wear mini launcher was inhibiting the install. Emailed the developer. Received an email with simple instructions within 1min. Problem solved 3 Min's later.

author: Amit Belani
comment: (1) It shows an ugly pink initial screen. Why doesn't it just automatically start recording instead, with say an optional 2 second warning delay? What else is there to do? (2) How about an opportunity for covert recording? (3) It shows a redundant notification every time I finish recording, asking me to launch the corresponding app on the phone. I know this already. How many times do I have to be reminded of the same? (4) How about implementing a "record" command that just works? (5) Can we do better than wav format?

author: Henry Gaddy
comment: Great in concept, badly executed. Has many bugs. Crashes constantly. Bought this app to record lectures but have lost valuable information due two crashes. Looking for a viable alternative that uses Android Wear.
The basic one is unusable. The basic should at least have basic function. With this experience, there in no way for me to consider upgrading.

author: Duncan Robb
comment: Doesn't save to external SD when I set it to. Instead it saves recordings to internal android/data folder and quickly fills my internal memory. Wasted money by upgrading to pro before I noticed

author: Dan Blood
comment: It's so quick as a dictaphone; if I have an idea I need to strum on a guitar, or hum or tap out, this app is always there for me..  So long as I have 6% or more battery.   The sync to Google docs is a little haphazard.. I am syncing all my recordings to date, having just got a pro account..  I can't quite tell what is being sent over, when; a details summary would be helpful. Recordings from this app are going to feed into a workflow on my pc, and I want to be sure that the recording I've just made will definitely be there when I get back to my desk.   I am impressed that you can choose specific tags to be sent to different cloud services, though. Like one for Google drive and one for drop box.

author: descart avel
comment: does nothing and lie. open on the watch. record. it says synchronized with a green check mark. and that's it. your recording is nowhere to be found.

author: Martin Egrt
comment: I like the design and connectivity between wearable and phone.. But automatic sync with cloud doesnt work, which is really shame :/ otherwise I you'd give you 5 stars...

author: Chris McAloney
comment: Great, but a few bugs. Every time I record, my settings have been reset and rather than using the compressed file size, it records as an uncompressed wav file. Please fix to ensure settings aren't lost after app updates

author: Roman Anderson
comment: HTC M7, LG Urbane 1, works great except that I can't change the audio quality on large files, so a one hour recording could me 60mb, which always crashes before syncing to phone. I have changed the audio quality setting, but for some reason it does not work. Please help!

author: CJ Knight
comment: Piece of $#!+.  This pile of crap has lost 2 critical recordings.  The files are hidden from file explorers and to make them visible to them is almost as painful as listening to Trump talking. I would never pay for the full version based upon how it's worked. Don't bother.

author: Neil Sargisian
comment: I depended on this app to record many very important conversation for legal purposes and now to my horror I have discovered that most of my recording have only complete silence on then. The app won't even let me message the developer properly.

author: Lizette Pradal
comment: Your UX is terrible!! is not enougth clear if you are saving your recording or recording a new one!! I lost a full interview because of you.

author: Kenneth Dahlin
comment: It still keeps crashing when taking photos on my pixel 1. Would pay, but not until this is fixed

author: Vladas Barisas
comment: Aesthetically a very nice recorder, however it seems to constantly forget my codec choice and also Dropbox/GDrive sync doesn't seem to work.

author: Ravishankar S
comment: I don't understand why this app asks me to give rating during the first time experience. I hate it

author: Robert Brenneman
comment: Doesn't work at all. Sticks at "synchronizing" for hours. Have uninstalled and reinstalled and adjusted settings with no solution.

author: Cole Flicek
comment: App doesn't work at all. Can't get any recordings to sync. There goes $2.99

author: Kastriot Qerimi
comment: Everytime I finish recording it crashes. It saves the audio file but it's the crashing that annoys me and frankly even "scare" me because as a journalist I have to make important audio records and if one day this app decides to crash and not save the audio file, I'm F***Ed.

author: Jasper Yeung
comment: It tells error occurred after recording and data was gone.
title: Still failed 😑

author: Wes Jones
comment: It doesn't save or allow me to access recordings from wear device. It's not the permissions. The watch records, and says it is syncing with the phone, yet the app on the phone does not add the recordings.

reply.author: BinomV
reply.content: Could you email me to binom.mobile@gmail.com?

title: Can't listen to recordings from wear

author: smi jmnda
comment: But somehow tags don't show immediately after recording . The need to new added from the main menu.
title: Thanks

author: Duane Gray
comment: LG Urbane with Note 5.  Crashed on open every time.  Had to uninstall?  Did not work at all.

author: Chris Zewatski
comment: Always get a Java null runtime error. Can't record on my Huawei watch.
title: Doesn't work

author: Stephane Sonier
comment: White background look awful on the watch but it does the job correctly as a recorder.

author: Ross Gardler
comment: Tested 5 times. Only once did it actually sync the file. Perhaps because I'm trying to record 60 minute meetings
